Posts.Content: I too have rib pain after treatment. Breast cancer,HER2+, Double lumpectomy, herceptin-one year, radiation 36 treatments. I was shocked to read the information in these posts, as I did not know about it before I went into all this, especially the radiation. Bra very uncomfortable (no underwires) sharp pain on radiated side, ribs, back.
Posts.Title: Rib pain months after radiation stops
